body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Know Before You Come     Lodging              Lodging        There are several motels near the I-49 exit on Hwy 6 and scattered through the city. In addition, Natchitoches is home to a large number of B&B's. For additional information contact:    Natchitoches Convention and Visitors Bureau    800/259-1714    www.natchitoches.net Photo by NPS
title: Cane River National Heritage Area: Lodging
